description: The SMMSTORE file can only be opened in the macOS version of SimpleMind. If you come across the file in Windows you will not be able to open it.

You can import it in the macOS version of SimpleMind (except for the free edition) by selecting MindMap → Import Mind Map Store... . You can also import an SMMSTORE file by selecting SimpleMind → Preferences... then choosing "Local Mind Maps" and clicking Import Mind Map Store .
